localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: BackgroundCut is the fastest & easiest way to remove or replace any image's background. It uses Artificial Intelligence to analyze and cut out any image's background with a single click. Just upload your image and remove the background in under 5 seconds!
nodes.title: BackgroundCut - Remove image background automatically with AI
nodes.author: HARSH RANJAN

nodes.excerpt: Vossle is a No-Code WebAR development SaaS platform with which businesses can create augmented reality in under 1 minute. It requires No-app downloads to experience world target, image target based campaigns, games or face detection based tryons.
nodes.title: Vossle WebAR - Create WebAR experience under 1 minute
nodes.author: Pankaj Singh

nodes.excerpt: Angle Audio is a free cross-platform social audio app for authentic group conversations. Join existing topics or start one yourself and enjoy features such as screen-sharing, text-chat and live-celebrations to connect with other users in audio conversations.
nodes.title: Angle Audio - Social audio group conversations for iOS, Android and web
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Gapt.ai provide a similar GPT-3 API, with good performance, and we use a completely open source code and is low cost.

nodes.excerpt: Nativeway has an only one specific purpose. It's encouraging the language learner to make a speaking from the first learning day.
nodes.title: Nativeway - Practice pronunciation with AI and other people
nodes.author: Fredric Cliver

nodes.excerpt: Datature is the fastest way to build your own computer vision models. Manage datasets, annotate, train, and deploy - we get ALL teams and companies on the right pipeline from day one!
nodes.title: Datature - No-code platform for building deep neural nets
nodes.author: Keechin

nodes.excerpt: Backprop is an API/platform that makes enhancing software with machine learning simple. With powerful out-of-the-box models, easy custom uploads, scalable infrastructure, and an affordable pricing scheme, Backprop has everything you need.
nodes.title: Backprop - Serverless machine learning API for every developer
nodes.author: Owen LaCava

nodes.excerpt: Resemble AIâ€™s new built-in integration with GPT-3 can generate realistic ad copy and conversations instantly. You can use the existing library of professional voices, or create your own custom AI voice, to generate high-quality voiceovers and dialogues.
nodes.title: GPT-3 Custom AI Voices - Combine GPT-3 with custom high quality AI voices
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: The first gas tool for artists & collectors to better understand gas fees by platform. Gas fees change, and are different depending on what youâ€™re doing, where, and at what speed. You can use the ğŸ¢ and ğŸ‡ at the top to toggle the speed of gas you want to use.

nodes.title: Rejoy Health - Comprehensive back and joint pain management

nodes.excerpt: Over 60 of the world's top crypto artists provided artwork, this is cut apart at specific points and randomly assembled and generated using AI and stored as an NFT in the blockchain.
nodes.title: Artvatars - AI generated artworks, stored in the blockchain

nodes.title: DataMool - Global predictive residential property investment analysis

nodes.excerpt: Stop wasting time and start creating the kind of content your learners deserve with Docebo Shape. Shapeâ€™s an AI-based content creation tool that lets you build beautiful and engaging xAPI content you can share with learners in just minutes.

nodes.excerpt: Halbestunde introduces a new way of learning the piano. The AI app is a co-trainer, ready to give you customized feedback at any time. Therefore, we use a specifically developed algorithm that allows the app to recognize and play every piece of music you want.
nodes.title: Halbestunde - Scan your piece of music and start practicing right away
nodes.author: Tiberius Treppner

nodes.excerpt: With Match you can copy colors of any image with one click. Use machine learning to create your own color grading presets and instantly change the color of your images with one powerful, simple-to-use app that runs directly in your browser.
nodes.title: Match by Color.io - Automatically match colors of any image or movie with ML

nodes.excerpt: A simple web app to procedurally generate random MIDI melodies that you can use royalty free in your own work.

nodes.excerpt: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
nodes.title: Listnr - Start a podcast without recording anything
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
nodes.author: Vincent Yang

nodes.excerpt: Sleep Formula is your personal sleep assistant that counts your sleep cycles and tracks your sleep. Wake up bright-eyed and bushy-tailed at ANY time even if you stay up late! Analyze your sleep and build healthy habits! Let's do it together!
nodes.title: Sleep Formula - App to improve your sleep using CBT & sleep tracker

nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
